mapper.sql: id, name, purchase, purchase_money as purchaseMoney, create_time as createTime, type, sing_name as singName, remark, quantity,brand,priace,library
mapper.insert: insert into t_purchase (id, name, commodity_number,purchase, purchase_money, create_time, type, sing_name, remark, quantity,brand,priace,library) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{priace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{library,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_purchase
id,
name,
brand,
purchase,
purchase_money,
create_time,
type,
sing_name,
remark,
quantity,
priace,
library,

mapper.update:
update t_purchase
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase = #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_money = #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sing_name = #{singName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
priace = #{priace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
library= #{library,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_purchase set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase = #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_money = #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sing_name = #{singName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priace = #{priace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, library = #{library,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_purchase order by create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}

select count(*) from t_purchase
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and name like concat("%", #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and purchase like concat("%", #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and purchase_money like concat("%", #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "%")
and create_time like concat("%", #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "%")
and type like concat("%", #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and sing_name like concat("%", #{singName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and remark like concat("%", #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")

select
from t_purchase
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and name like concat("%", #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and purchase like concat("%", #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and purchase_money like concat("%", #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "%")
and create_time like concat("%", #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "%")
and type like concat("%", #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and sing_name like concat("%", #{singName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
and remark like concat("%", #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
order by create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}
select from t_purchase where CONCAT(id, name, purchase, purchase_money, create_time, type, sing_name, remark) like CONCAT('%',#{s},'%') order by create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}
select count(*) from t_purchase where CONCAT(id, name, purchase, purchase_money, create_time, type, sing_name, remark) like CONCAT('%',#{s},'%') order by create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}
